AI Description: TALON (Transcript Annotation Long-read ONtology) is a software package for identifying and quantifying full-length mRNA isoforms in long-read RNA sequencing data. It leverages the unique advantages of long-read sequencing to provide comprehensive and accurate gene expression analysis at the isoform level.
Core Features:
1. Identification of full-length mRNA isoforms
2. Quantification of gene expression at the isoform level
3. Annotation of novel isoforms
4. Detection of alternative splicing events
5. Integration with short-read RNA-seq data for comprehensive analysis
General Tags: Long-Read RNA Sequencing, Transcript Isoform Analysis, Gene Expression Quantification
